title: An answer to the Animadversions on the History of the rights of princes, &c. by Gilbert Burnet.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: A reply to Thomas Comber's Animadversions on Dr. Burnet's History of the rights of princes, 1682.
Another issue appears in his "A collection of several tracts", 1685.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
